column4: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource. Facilitates discovery (search); allows content to be associated with JPLer.
Date of creation of the resource. Vital for effective ERM and disposition.
An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context. Vital for effective ERM and disposition; facilitates “dashboard” use and reuse of content.
A name given to the resource. Facilitates discovery (search).
The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource. Vital for effective ERM and disposition.
The nature or genre of the resource. Facilitates discovery (search); vital for effective ERM and disposition; facilitates “dashboard” use and reuse of content.
Information about rights held in and over the resource. Facilitates “dashboard” use and reuse of content.
The topic of the resource per enterprise keywords.
